author: Stan Lee
description: A classic comic book featuring the first appearance of Spider-Man. Follow Peter Parker as he learns to balance high school life with superhero duties in New York City.

author: Alan Moore
description: A dark and critically acclaimed graphic novel that delves deep into the origin of The Joker, Batman's most notorious foe.

author: Chris Claremont
description: A time-traveling story where the X-Men must stop an event that will lead to the downfall of mutants and humanity alike.

author: George PÃ©rez
description: Wonder Woman's origin story is retold as she is introduced to the world of man and must take on her role as a superhero.

author: Neil Gaiman
description: The beginning of the Sandman saga, where Dream, one of the Endless, escapes from captivity and seeks to reclaim his lost power.

author: Don McGregor
description: One of the earliest Black Panther stories, where T'Challa fights to protect Wakanda from revolutionaries and external threats.
